/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/chapter_0.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter_0.dir/vk_engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter_0.dir/vk_initializers.cpp.o  -o ../bin/chapter_0  ../third_party/libvkbootstrap.a ../third_party/libtinyobjloader.a ../third_party/libimgui.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libvulkan.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSDL2main.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSDL2.so -lpthread -ldl
